name: revaccination
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process or act of giving someone a vaccine (= a substance that protects against a disease) again for the same disease: The need for revaccination has not yet been determined. According to vets, re-vaccination is necessary every six months. As immunity to Covid-19 fades over time, people will need periodic boosters or revaccinations. Related words
vaccination
revaccinate
More examplesFewer examplesFor people at high risk, revaccination is recommended after five years. Complications are rare, but at least ten times more common after primary vaccination than after revaccination.The recalled doses are considered potent, so revaccinations won't be needed.
